clean_body_surface.description: Wipe clean the entire surface of the table body.

basic_checkup.description: Perform basic surface check on the furniture body by pressing on various points.

check_body.description: Press the body of the table to check its robustness.

clean_body.description: Clean the body of the furniture to maintain its appearance.

verify_furniture_body.description: Press on the furniture body to check its firmness.

clean_furniture_body.description: Wipe the furniture body to clean any dust or stains.

press_and_check_body.description: Press and sense the firmness of the table body to ensure its stability.

inspect_furniture_body.description: Press the table body to check its stability and rigidity.

press_furniture_body.description: Press the furniture body to check its stability and robustness.

swipe_furniture_body.description: Swipe the furniture body to clean any superficial dust or particles.

check_wheel_rotational_movement.description: Rotate the wheel to ensure proper function in facilitating smooth table movement.

clean_wheel_surface.description: Ensure the wheel is free of dirt or debris for good functioning by wiping the surface clean.

wheel_functionality_test.description: Check the responsiveness of pressure sensors in the wheel by pressing down on it

rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to ensure smooth movements of the table.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to maintain its functionality.

press_wheel.description: Press the wheel to check its functionality.

test_wheel.description: Press the wheel to check its smooth rotation.

wipe_wheel.description: Swipe over the wheel surface to clean it from any dust or debris.

move_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel to facilitate easy movement of the table.

check_wheel.description: Press the wheel to ascertain if it's working.

adjust_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel for aligning and positioning the table.

swipe_wheel.description: Swipe the wheel to clean any superficial dust or particles.

clean_table.description: Clean both the table body and the wheel to maintain good table hygiene.

table_checkup.description: Perform a general checkup of both the table body and wheel through pressing and rotation.

table_maintenance.description: Perform periodic maintenance of the table by cleaning through a wipe and checking wheel rotation

clean_entire_table.description: Clean the entire table, including the wheel and the body.

complete_table_check.description: Check the entire table, including a rotation of the wheel and a press on the body.

table_performance_check.description: Perform a performance check on the table, including a rotation of the wheel and a press on the body.

provide_table_service.description: Perform a general service of the table, checking wheels, cleaning body to ensure it is in good condition.

maintain_table.description: Routine maintenance of the table by cleaning entire table and checking wheels for smooth movement.

service_table.description: Conduct a detailed cleanup and inspection of the table, covering both the body and wheel.

refresh_table.description: Do a complete cleanup of the table, including the wheel and body.

clean_and_check_table.description: Clean the entire table, including the wheel and body, and check for its condition and stability.

clean_whole_table.description: Clean the entire table including the wheel and body.

check_table.description: Inspect the overall condition of the table, including its body and wheel movement.
